What Can We Do About Eliminating Health
Hazards In Our Community?
How Can The Local Community Action Agency
Help In Resolving Some Of These Problems
In Our Community?
"DIALOGUES FROM THE GHETTO"
Is a program series device which explores each
problem in depth. Here the support agencies of
the community, the resource agencies of the community
can be brought into the conscious world of the
poor and disadvantaged, the "operating" world. Here,
through such confrontation, the inadequacies, and
strengths, of existing support structures can be
examined and discussed. The inequities suffered
by the poor can be talked about openly. Through
such exchanges, we can, hopefully, begin to reÂ¬
solve some of these problems together. Through
such experiences we can begin to break through
the feelings of helplessness, the tacit acceptance
of second class citizenship, another dominant
characteristic of large segments of the poverty
population. What can we talk about in these
dialogues? Some subject areas might be:
